ygData.subject: Eye of Zomm - Bugged ?
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night I was passing through Highhold pass and a friend told me to stop by an have a beer with her ( Yeah those rough Barb. type women ) So I thought I
ygData.messageBody:
Last night I was passing through Highhold pass and a
friend told me to stop by an have a beer with her ( Yeah those rough
Barb. type women )

So I thought I would try to impress her with my Eye of Zomm. She was
killing Orc's on the Kithi side of the
pass. So I cast the eye - moved it around the ORC spawning area - but
could not see her.

She, however could see me ( the eye ) - then I noticed when I went to
meet her that there where a LOT more Players in the area than I could
see through the eye before .

I asked her to stay there and repeated it again . Out of the 10 players
present - I could only see 2 through the eye - the others were just not
visable. I could see all the ORC's that spawned - just not all the
players - through the eye.

Is this some form of " cant see all the PC's through the eye " bug ?

Junerius.
